decision_conditions: Prior Approval is refused because Part 3 Class C of the General Permitted Development Order is specifically designed for change of use to restaurant Class A3 of the Use Classes Order, whereas the application is seeking change of use to a mixed use of class A3 and A5, which therefore is not eligible for permitted development rights under this Part of the Order.

Prior approval is refused because the proposal fails to comply with paragraph (e) of Part 3 Class C of the GPDO, because insufficient information has been provided to assess the impact of the proposal upon the highways condition. In the absence of the appropriate transport statement, it would not be possible to consider whether the proposal would have satisfactory impact upon the safe and free flow of traffic upon the highways condition.

Prior approval is refused because the proposal fails to comply with paragraphs (a), (b) and (d) of Part 3 Class C of the GPDO, because insufficient information has been provided to assess the impact of the proposal upon the amenities of the neighbouring buildings with respect to noise, fume associated with the use of the proposed scheme. In the absence of such information, the proposal is judged to be potentially harmful to neighbouring amenity.

Prior approval is refused because the proposal fails to comply with paragraphs (c) of Part 3 Class C of the GPDO, because insufficient information has been provided to assess the impact of the proposal with respect not storage and handling of waste in relation to the development.

Prior approval is refused because the proposal fails to comply with paragraphs (g) of Part 3 Class C of the GPDO, because insufficient information has been provided to assess the impact of the proposal with respect to its aesthetic considerations.
description: Change of use of ground floor from A1 (retail) to A3/A5 (PRIOR APPROVAL)
